content: knit a simple baby beanie using a wool blend yarn and attach pom pom poms for added cuteness you can make 2-3 hats with one skein of wool-ease thick & quick these beanies work up quickly and make perfect newborn gifts the free pattern can be found ** here 1 ** if you are interested in knitting a **matching adult or child beanie** click ** here 2 ** for the free pattern note that the pdf for purchase includes all **three patterns** adult child and baby sizing 1 https //www allaboutami com/basic-knitted-baby-hat/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/basic-knitted-adult-hat/
